body.p: This is available in the tab Agents modules.
It is possible to say to plugin how to give order to agent when they contact it.
Each plugin fusinv... can add a module in this menu, by default, you have only WAKEONLAN because it is integrated in this plugin.
For each module you can configure :

ul.li: Activation by default : default activation of this module (it's activated or not).

Agents exceptions : It depends on Activation by default but invert activation for each agent selected.Activation de la partie découverte (découverte SNMP, Netbios, NMAP). For exemple if WAKEONLAN is not activated by default and we put an exception of agent "computer01-2010-11-24", this agent will be able to get order "WAKEONLAN" from plugin, and invert when default activation is checked.
